name: @trimbleinc/modus-bootstrap
description: Modus Bootstrap is a responsive framework developed as a common platform for all Trimble web applications. It is built upon and extends the Bootstrap 4 framework.

scripts.dev: npm-run-all js:compile-dev sass:compile-dev --parallel sass:watch js:watch dev:server
scripts.js:build: npm run js:compile && npm run js:minify
scripts.sass:compile-dev: node-sass scss/modus.scss samples/css/modus.css && node-sass scss/modus-dark.scss samples/css/modus-dark.css && node-sass scss/modus-layout.scss samples/css/modus-layout.css && postcss samples/css/*.css --config ./ --verbose --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.css:compile: shx mkdir -p dist/ && node-sass scss/modus.scss dist/modus.css && node-sass scss/modus-dark.scss dist/modus-dark.css && node-sass scss/modus-layout.scss dist/modus-layout.css && postcss dist/*.css --config ./ --verbose --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.css:minify: npm run css:compile && cleancss -O1 --output dist/modus.min.css dist/modus.css && cleancss -O1 --output dist/modus-dark.min.css dist/modus-dark.css && cleancss -O1 --output dist/modus-layout.min.css dist/modus-layout.css
scripts.build: npm run css:lint && npm run css:minify && npm run js:build

author: Trimble Inc.
